131829.「邪悪なる意志とやらの 尻尾をつかもうと\n あちこち まわってみたんだけどよ。:
I've been wandering around trying to catch
that Evil Will or whatever it's called by
the tail... but no luck.

131830.「そんとき ナドラガ教団の連中が 嵐の領界で\n 邪神復活のため 何か やらかそ:
That's when I got word that the Nadraga Order
was doing something in the Storm Realm to try
to revive their evil god.

131831.「邪神の復活を 止めてやるって\n フィナにも 言っちまったからなあ。:
I already told Fina that I wasn't gonna let
that happen.

131832.「オレも お前と 一緒に行くぜ。\n よろしくな <pc>。:
I'm coming with you. Let's get a move on,
shall we?

131833.「それじゃ さっそく\n 嵐の領界へ 向かうとしよう！: Here we go... straight into the Storm Realm!

131834.「おいおい なんだよ……。\n 町を見つけたと思ったら この有り様か。:
Hey, what the hell...? You think you've
found a town, but what a mess...

131835.「……人の姿が 見えねえ。\n あいつらに 襲われちまったんだろうな。\n かわ:
...there doesn't look to be a single person
here. They must've been attacked by those
guys. Poor things...

131836.「こんな 大きな町が\n 魔物に やられちまうなんて\n いったい 何があったん:
What the hell happened to a town this big to
be attacked by monsters like that...?

131837.「ナドラガ教団のせいかもしれねえな。\n 手がかりが 残っていないか\n 町の中:
It's probably the Nadraga Order who did this.
Let's look around and see what we can find.

131838.「おい <pc>。\n いったい 何をやらかしたんだ！？:
Hey, <pc>!
What's with all the noise?!

131839.「……へえ。\n こいつは 隠し階段ってヤツか？: Huh. What is this, a hidden staircase?

131840.「よく見つけたな <pc>。\n さっそく 降りてみようぜ！: Nice find. Let's see what's down there!

131842.「よかった。生き残りが いたんだな。\n オレたちゃ 竜族じゃねえが\n あやし:
There are survivors... that's good. We aren't
Nadravians, but we aren't dangerous. I swear.

131843.「我々は 悪に染まったナドラガ教団から\n 竜族の自由と平和を取り戻すべく 立ち:
We are the Nadravian Liberation Alliance, also known as the Gale Knights! We stand to restore the freedom of those tainted by the
wicked Nadraga Order!

131844.「貴様たちは ナドラガ教団の手の者だな！\n 何もせず 立ち去るのであれば\n:
You are in league with the Order, aren't you?!
If you had just walked away quietly, we
wouldn't have had to make a scene...

131845.「だから ちょっと待てって。\n オレたちは ナドラガ教団のモンじゃねえよ。:
Hold your horses. We're not part of the
Nadraga Order.

131846.「あの連中とは いざこざがあってな。\n ヤツらが この領界で たくらんでること:
I've already had a bad rap with those guys.
I came to this realm to stop whatever they
were up to.

131847.「ふんっ……。\n 教団の犬風情が よくも ぬけぬけと！:
Hmph... How dare you dogs of the Order act so
shamelessly!

131848.「ダメだな こりゃ。\n 話が 通じそうもねえ……。:
This is going nowhere. He's not listening to
me...

131849.「……いいんだぜ。\n オレたちを どうにかしたいってんなら\n 相手に なって:
...Fine. If you want to do something about us,
then be our guest.

131851.「お久しぶり……ですね。: It's been a while... hasn't it?

131852.「<pc>さん……。\n あれほど 来てはいけないと言っておいたのに\n ついに:
<pc>... I told you numerous times
not to come here... and yet, here you are at
last.

131853.「仕方ありません……。\n それならば 私は\n できる限りのことをするだけです:
I suppose there's no helping it now... in that
case, I'll just do the best that I can...

131854.「あの…… クロウズ様。\n その異種族の者とは いったい\n どのような ご関:
Um... Claws, if I may... What is your
relationship with these foreign races?

131855.<if_woman>「彼女は 私の……\n アストルティアでの 古くからの友人で:
<if_woman>She<else>He<endif> is... an old friend of mine, from
Astoltia.

131856.「そして <kyodai>さんの\n <pc_rel2>にあたる方でもあります。:
And also the one who is related to
<kyodai>.

131857.「なっ なんと！\n <kyodai>様の ご親族の方とは。:
W-what?! I had no idea you were
<kyodai>'s relative!

131858.「はじめまして ヒューザさん。\n あなたのことは 存じ上げております。:
It's nice to meet you, Hyuza. I know who you
are.

131859.「ウェディの神 マリーヌの神の器……。\n 我々は あなたを歓迎しますよ。:
The divine vessel of the Weddie goddess,
Marine... we welcome you here.

131860.「……<pc>さん。\n いろいろと お話ししたいことがあります。:
And, <pc>... we have a lot to
discuss.

131861.「地下に入って 最下層まで降りた所に\n 騎士団の部屋が ありますので\n そち:
At the lowest level there is a room called
the Knights' Quarters. Could you please meet
me there?

131862.「ブレエゲ。あなたたちも 地下に戻り\n 警戒を 強めてください。\n 今 この:
Breyga. I need you to go back underground and
stay vigilant. We cannot afford to lose this
base right now.

131863.「はっ！ かしこまりました。\n 周辺を確認後 各自 ただちに\n 持ち場へと:
Yes, sir! Understood. After sweeping the
area, each of us will return to our posts
immediately!

131864.「なんだよ <pc>。\n この領界の竜族にも 知り合いがいたのか。\n まった:
Wow <pc>. You know Nadravians in
this realm too, huh? You've really been around
the block.

131865.「まあ 誤解は解けたようだし\n 地下に 入ってみようぜ。\n 騎士団の部屋まで:
Well, looks like that misunderstanding was
all cleared up, so let's head undeground. We
gotta go to that Knights' Quarters place.

131866.「<pc>さん。\n 我らが 疾風の騎士団の拠点へ ようこそ。:
<pc>. Welcome to the bastion of
the Gale Knights.

131867.「ナドラガンドに渡った私が 最初に着いたのが\n 嵐の領界でした。そこで 私は\:
After I crossed over into Nadragand, I first
arrived in the Storm Realm. There, I was
reunited with <kyodai>.

131868.「<kyodai>さんが ナドラガンドにいたことは\n 私にとっても おどろきで:
I was surprised that they were in Nadragand as
well... but I suppose that was just fate.

131869.「見違えるように たくましくなった あの人から\n 私は ナドラガ教団に対抗する:
They had become quite strong, and asked me
about creating an organization that could
oppose the Nadraga Order.

131870.「それが 何を意味するのか……\n 私には すぐに わかりました。: What that entailed... I knew immediately.

131871.「それゆえ <kyodai>さんに協力して\n ムストの人々を説得し 苦労の末に:
Thus, with <kyodai>'s help and
after much hard work, we managed to convince
Must's people to form the Gale Knights.

131872.「そして……私は\n もうひとつの絶望を 見てしまいました……。:
And then... that's when I witnessed another
despair...

131873.「あなたが ナドラガンドで 命を落とし\n 永遠に 帰らぬ人となる……という絶望:
The despair... that you will lose your life
here in Nadragand and never return.

131875.「……はい。残念ながら それが\n いつのことかは わかりませんでした。\n 何:
Yes... unfortunately, I wasn't able to discern
when it would happen. Something great looms
in our future...

131876.「それゆえ あなたが こちらの世界へ来なければ\n 避けられる運命であると 考え:
That's why I thought that if you didn't come
here, then you could avoid that fate.

131877.「……これまで 伝えずにいたことは\n 私も 心苦しく 思っていました。\n そ:
I've felt quite guilty about not telling you
about it until just now. Still, I kept quiet
because...

131878.「あなたが みずから 死地に飛び込む\n 勇気の持ち主と 知っていたからです。:
...I knew you were brave enough to jump into
a situation that could cost you your life.

131879.「伝えてしまえば この未来が決まってしまう。\n そんな予感がしたのです……。:
I felt if I told you, that future would be set
in stone. That's why I didn't tell you...

131880.「ですが ここまで来てしまった以上\n その勇気こそが 死の運命に あらがう\n:
But now that we have come this far, we have to
have faith that that courage is the only way
to defy that fate of death.

131881.「……<pc>さんには もうひとつ\n 伝えなければならないことが あります。\:
There's one more thing I need to tell you.
It concerns a certain group of people...

131884.「やっぱり 私には あなたが必要。\n あらためて そう思うの……。:
I still need you after all. I realize that
now...

131885.「<pc>さん。ぼくたちのために\n ここまで 来てくれたんですよね。\n 本当:
I know you came all the way here for us,
<pc>. I'm really sorry to have
made everyone worry.

131887.「気がついたとき 私たちは この部屋にいたの。\n クロウズさんと <kyoda:
When we came to, we were inside this room.
Claws and <kyodai> immediately
told us what was going on.

131888.「私は 人間の神グランゼニスの……: That I am the human god Gran Zenith's...

131889.「そして ラグアス王子は\n プクリポの神ピナヘトの チカラを宿す\n 神の器と:
...and Raguas is the divine vessel of the
Pukulipo god, Pinaheto.

131890.「この竜族の世界にある ナドラガ教団は\n 邪神を復活させるという目的のため\n:
The Nadraga Order is trying to gather the
divine vessels in order to resurrect their
evil god.

131891.「それに気づいた <kyodai>さんが\n 彼らから 私たちを守るために\n:
I heard that <kyodai> had noticed
this, and took the initiative to protect us
from them.

131893.「教団から 一刻も早く 神の器を保護するため\n 少々 強引なやり方になってしま:
We resorted to an aggressive approach in
protecting the vessels from the Order. I'm
sorry that I wasn't able to explain.

131894.「全員は無理でしたが あなたを含めて\n ここにいる３人は 保護できたようです。:
We weren't able to get all of them, but we
were at least able to protect you and the
other three here.

131895.「神の器ってのは なんなんだよ？\n そんなもんを集めて どうしようってんだ？:
What even is a divine vessel? What are they
planning to with them, anyways?

131896.「６人の神の器は 六柱の種族神がほどこした\n いましめから 竜族の神ナドラガの:
It's said the six divine vessels are needed to
free the body of Nadraga from the bindings the
six racial gods placed upon him.

131897.「残る３人も 捜索中ではありますが……\n 神の器の他に もうひとつ ナドラガ神:
The remaining three are still being searched
for... but in addition to the vessels, there
is one final key to his resurrection.

131898.「ここから先は 場所を変えて 話しましょう。\n 部屋を出て 右に見える扉の中に:
Let's move this conversation to a different
place. If you would, please go to the meeting
room. It's to your right when you leave here.

131899.「オレも 巻き込まれちまってるわけか。\n イヤだと言える雰囲気じゃねえし\n:
Guess I'm involved in all this too, huh? I'm
really in no position to refuse... so I'll
stick around to hear the rest.

131900.「<pc>さんに 見せなければ\n ならないものが あるのです……。\n 私は:
There's something I need to show you,
<pc>... I will go on ahead.

131901.「そろいましたね。\n それでは 私に ついてきてください。: Everyone is here. Please follow me.

131902.「これは <kyodai>さんの錬金術によって\n 作り出された 他にはない特殊:
This is a special ward created by
<kyodai>'s alchemy. I am the only person
who knows how it works.

131903.「ここには 危険なものが保管されています。\n このような 強力な結界を張り 守:
A dangerous object is stored here. So
dangerous... that a strong ward like this one
is necessary to protect it.

131953.「一緒に行けなくて 本当に ごめんなさい。:
I'm really sorry that I wasn't able to come
with you.

131954.「<pc>さん。ナドラガ神のほこらに\n ボクたちと同じ 神の器である\n フウ:
I heard that Fuura was taken to the Nadraga
Shrine, since she's a divine vessel just like
we are.

131955.「フウラさんは 邪神の身体を復活させるための\n いけにえに されてしまうかもし:
There's a high chance she will be sacrificed
to revive that evil god. We must save her
quickly!

131956.「ほこらに向かうには アストルティアで\n 天風のたづなを手に入れて 神獣アマカ:
To get to that shrine, we need the Divine Wind
Reins from Astoltia to ask the divine beast
Amazlantelope to lend us his power.

131957.「あなたにばかり 大変なことを頼んでしまって\n 本当に 申し訳ないけれど……:
I really apologize for asking you to do all
the heavy lifting, but...

131958.「私は クロウズさんに言われたとおり\n ここに残って 身体を治すわ。:
I'm going to stay here and recover per Claws'
request.

131959.「だから 天風のたづなの入手と\n フウラさんの救出は\n あなたに お願いした:
So, I need you to get those Divine Wind Reins
so we can save Fuura.

131960.「シオンさまが エルトナ大陸にある\n 山間の関所に行くといいと 言っていたわ。:
Shion said that you should go to the Mountain
Pass in Eltona. Please be careful on your way
there.

131961.「エルドナ神の命により この地に眠りて\n どれほどの月日が 経ったのか……。:
By Eldona's command, I have slept within this
land. How many moons has it been, I wonder...

131962.「我が名は 森羅蛮獣なり。\n そなたらは 天風のたづなを求める者よな。:
I am called Equistrion. You seek the Divine
Wind Reins, do you not?

131963.「チカラなき者に 天風のたづなを\n 与えることは 許されぬ。\n 我と戦い そ:
I cannot give the Divine Wind Reins to those
who have not proven themselves. Come! Fight
me and show me your power!

131964.「……何度でも 相手をしてやろう。\n 天風のたづなを求める者よ。:
I will deal with you again and again. O you
who seek the tether of the heavenly wind.

131965.「チカラなき者に 天風のたづなを\n 与えることは 許されぬ。\n 我と戦い そ:
I cannot give the Divine Wind Reins to those
who have not proven themselves. Come! Fight
me and show me your power!

131966.「……そなたのチカラ 見せてもらった。\n 森羅蛮獣の名において 天風のたづなを:
I have recognized your power... In the name of
I, Equistrion, I recognize you as worthy of
holding the Divine Wind Reins.

131967.「だが 授けるのは そのものにあらず。\n 我のたてがみを 持っていくがよい。:
However, what I bestow is not the reins
themselves. Here, take my mane.

131969.「その たてがみこそが\n 天風のたづなの いしずえとなる。:
This mane is the foundation of the Divine Wind
Reins.

131970.「エルトナ大陸のいずこかに\n 今も いるであろう\n たづな作りの技を継ぐ者に:
You must entrust this to one who inherits the
art of rein making. They may still exist
somewhere in the lands of Eltona.

131971.「我の役目も ようやく 果たされた。\n さあ そなたは 行くがよい。:
My purpose has finally been fulfilled. Now, it
is time for you to go.

131972.「<pc>。お帰りなさい。\n 私も 治療に専念しているのだけど\n クロウズさ:
Welcome back, <pc>. I'm still
focused on my recovery, but Claws still hasn't
given me permission to leave...

131973.「……そちらは 天風のたづなを\n 手に入れることが できたみたいね。\n あな:
You were able to get the Divine Wind Reins,
weren't you? I can tell by the look on your
face.

131974.「それがあれば 神獣アマカムシカが\n きっと チカラを貸してくれると思うの。:
With those, I'm certain the divine beast will
help us.

131975.「神獣アマカムシカは この町から\n 北東にある 神獣の森の奥にいるそうですね。:
I heard that Amazlantelope is deep within the
Stormbough to the northeast of town.

131976.「神獣アマカムシカのチカラを借りれば\n フウラさんが 連れていかれた\n ナド:
With his help, we should be able to get to the
Nadraga Shrine where Fuura was taken.

131977.「一緒に行けなくて ごめんなさい。\n でも <pc>なら\n フウラさんを助け:
I'm sorry that I can't go with you.... but I
know you'll be able to save Fuura!

131985.「オルルル……。こわっぱよ。\n ここが アマカムシカさまの寝所と知って\n 足:
Grrr... little whelp. You knew that this was
the resting place of the great Amazlantelope,
yet still you stepped foot here...?

131986.「もしや こわっぱの分際で\n アマカムシカさまに 会いたいなどと\n ぬかすの:
You didn't really think a little whelp like
you could actually see the great
Amazlantelope, did you?!

131987.「このワシ…… 巨竜樹タツノギの\n 目の黒いうちは アマカムシカさまに\n 指:
As long as I, Tree Dragon Tatsunogi, continue
to draw breath, you shall not lay even a
single finger on his greatness!

131989.「……おろかな こわっぱよ。\n ふたたび この地に 足を踏み入れるとは\n ま:
You foolish little whelp. Did you not learn
last time what it means to set foot in this
place?

131990.「ならば 今一度\n その身に 知らしめてくれようぞ！: Then allow me to indulge you once more!

131992.「うぐぬぬぬ……。\n こんな こわっぱに やられるとは……。:
Hrrrghh... I never thought I'd be beaten by
such a whelp...

131993.「だが アマカムシカさまの守護者たるワシが\n この程度で 倒れるわけには いか:
But as the great Amazlantelope's guardian, I
will not fall by something so trivial.
GRAAAAAAAGH!!!

131995.「おお アマカムシカさま。\n お身体のほうは 大丈夫なので？:
Ohh, Master Amazlantelope! Are you feeling
well?

131996.「この地に吹き荒れる 悪しき業風は\n いまだ 消える気配はない……。\n です:
The evil winds that continue to blow through
this land show no signs of subsiding... But
worry not.

131997.「少しくらいならば 動くことはできます。\n それよりも そちらの者……。:
I am able to move just a little. Moreover,
about that person...

131998.「やはり これは……。\n なつかしい ニオイを感じます。\n あなたの名は？:
I knew that I sensed a familiar scent...
What is your name?

131999.「……<cs_pchero>というのですね。\n 天風のたづなを 手に入れ ここ:
So you are called <cs_pchero>... I see
that you have the Divine Wind Reins. What
is your purpose in coming here?

132000.「……なんと！！\n かつて エルドナ神が使われた神具を\n なぜ このような者:
What?! How could someone like them come to
possess such a sacred object once used by
the goddess Eldona herself...?!

132001.「落ち着きなさい タツノギ。\n この者に 話を聞かせてもらいましょう。:
Please calm yourself, Tatsunogi. Let this one
speak.

132002.<cs_pchero>は これまでの出来事を\n神獣アマカムシカに 語って聞かせ:
<cs_pchero> explained to Amazlantelope
what had transpired so far.

132003.「私が 悪しき業風から逃れて\n この泉で 身をいやしている間に\n そのような:
I came to this fountain to escape the evil
winds... I had no idea that any of this was
happening...

132004.「竜族を総べる神でありながら\n 他の六種族 すべてを支配しようとした\n ごう:
The arrogant Nadraga sought to rule over the
other six races...

132005.「エルドナ神から 領界を預かった身として\n この地に封じられし 邪神の肉体の復:
As I have been entrusted with this realm from
Eldona, I must do everything in my power to
stop the resurrection of that wicked god.

132006.「森羅蛮獣も あなたを認めて\n 天風のたづなを 託した……。\n ならば それ:
If Equistrion also recognized your power and
entrusted you with the reins... then it must
be nothing more than fate.

132007.「私の神気も ほとんど 失われていますが\n 天風のたづなのチカラを借りれば\n:
Although I've lost much of my divine power,
if I borrow the Divine Wind Reins' power, I
should be able to assist you somehow.

132008.「<cs_pchero>。\n 私に 天風のたづなを……。:
<cs_pchero>. Please give me the
Divine Wind Reins...

132009.<cs_pchero>は 天風のたづなを取り出し\n神獣アマカムシカに 取り付け:
<cs_pchero> took out the Divine Wind
Reins and fastened them to Amazlantelope.

132010.「ありがとう <cs_pchero>。\n すこし チカラが わいてきました。\:
You have my thanks. I do feel a little
stronger. I think I can defy the evil winds
even for just a moment.

132012.「タツノギ。留守は まかせます。\n 烈風の岬は 天ツ風の原の 北でしたね。\n:
I'll leave this place in your care, Tatsunogi.
The Cape Squall is north of the Howling
Highlands, yes? Please meet me there.

132013.「お待たせしました <pc>。\n めざす ナドラガ神のほこらは\n この烈風の:

132016.「<pc> 烈風の岬を渡りたいのですね。\n ならば 私に乗ってください。:

<cs_pchero>. Have you come here to

132020.「……あなたが 教団の救済を拒む組織と\n 接触したとの報告は 受けております。:

132022.「その救済の儀式を 邪魔をしようと\n いうのですね……。: And now you want to interfere...

132024.「それなのに あなたは\n その救済への道を 閉ざすべく 現れた。\n もはや:
And yet, you've come to obstruct that path

132025.「エステラさま。\n ここは おまかせください！: Lady Estella, leave this to us!

132026.「この反逆者の相手は 私たちがします。\n エステラさまは 復活の儀式を！:
We'll deal with this traitor. You focus on the

132027.「……お待ちなさい。\n これは 神が 私に与えた試練なのです。:

132030.「私のすべてのチカラで……！！: With all the power vested in me...!

132035.「あなたを失うなんて 考えられない。\n だから 私……。: I couldn't imagine losing you. That's why...

132039.「誰であろうと それは 許しません。\n ナドラガさまを復活させ 竜族を救うため:

132041.「いいえ！ ナドラガさまは\n 私たち竜族を お救いくださる方です。\n 悪神な:

132045.「<cs_pchero>！！\n このままじゃ フウラさんも 危険だわ。\n 一:

132047.「<cs_pchero>っ。\n このままでは フウラさんが 危ないわ！:
<cs_pchero>. If we do nothing, then

132048.「あなたも チカラを貸して！\n 一緒に 戦いましょう！！:

132053.「ルブル……？ それに レビレ……。\n 私は いったい……。: Rubul...? And Leville... what did I...

132056.「……わかりません。\n どこからか 鈴の音が聞こえてきたところまでは\n 覚え:

132063.「……あれっ！？ ここ どこ？\n 私 いったい どうなってたの……？:

132066.「この領界を守護する神獣も\n 私たちを 止めようとするのですね……。:

132067.「まさか また竜化なさる おつもりですか！？\n これ以上の竜化の術は お命に関:
Don't tell me you're planning to become a

132068.「今 あなたを失うことは\n 総主教さまも 望んでおられないはずです。\n どう:

132069.「……わかりました。\n 一度 教団へ戻りましょう。: I understand... let us return to the Order.

132072.「<cs_pchero>さま ここは どこなの？\n それに この おっきい カ:
<cs_pchero>, where are we? And what's

132074.「ヒメア様を 生き返らせてくれたところまでは\n 覚えているんだけど その後が:

132075.「フウラさん はじめまして。\n 私は アンルシアと言います。\n <cs_pc:

132077.「ええっ？ そうなんですか。\n 助けていただいて ありがとうございます！: Huh? Really? Thanks for helping me!

132078.「フウラさんを連れて 早く\n ムストの町に 戻りましょう <cs_pchero:

132169.「また 私たちを\n 止めに 来たのですね……。: So, you've come to stop us once more...

132208.「ここは 一度 退くことにしましょう。\n 打つ手を考えなければ なりません……:

132209.「このままでは 教団が……。: If we do nothing, the Order will...

Huff... puff... I knew it was you,

132211.「私です。ムストの町のバッセです。\n <kyodai>さん救出作戦の 下調べの:
I am Basse from the Town of Must.

132212.「クロウズさんが 心配していましたので\n すぐに ムストの町へ お戻りください:

132213.「……<pc>さん。\n 今の彼は あなたのお仲間である\n 疾風の騎士団の者で:
...<pc>. Wasn't he one of your

132214.「嵐の領界にある ムストの町が\n その組織の拠点に なっていることは\n 私も:
I've been told that Must in the Storm Realm
is where their organization is based.

132215.「どうか 私を 彼らのもとへ\n 連れていっては いただけないでしょうか？\n:
Do you think you could take me to them? If we
work together, we might be able to come up
with some sort of plan.<yesno><close>

132216.「そんなことを 言わずに……。\n 彼らと協力すれば 道が開けるかもしれません。:
Don't say that...if we work together, we
might be able to come up with some sort of
plan.

132217.「どうか 私を 彼らのもとへ\n 連れていっては いただけないでしょうか？<ye: Please, will you take me to them?<yesno><close>

132218.「ありがとうございます……。\n それでは ムストの町へ 向かいましょう。: Thank you so much... Let's make our way there.

132219.「……<pc>さん。\n 私のチカラ及ばず すべての領界が\n ひとつに つなが:
<pc>... It was beyond my control
to keep all of the realms from connecting to
one another.

132220.「神の器も奪われ こちらに残されたのは\n いまだ 正体もつかめぬ 創生の霊核の:
The divine vessels have been taken from us... and all we have left is the core of creation, whose true nature is still unknown.
The situation has gotten quite serious...

132221.「……そちらの方は ナドラガ教団の神官\n エステラさんですね。私は クロウズ。:
...and you are Estella, priestess of the
Nadraga Order, aren't you? My name is Claws.
It's a pleasure to meet you.

132222.「……私は もう\n ナドラガ教団の神官では ありません。\n 先ほど 破門され:
...I am no longer a priestess of the Order...
I've recently just learned of my
excommunication.

132223.「あなた方と 話をするため\n <pc>さんに 頼んで\n ここに 連れてきても:
I had asked <pc> to bring me here,
so that I may speak with you.

132224.「ほう……。うたがうわけでは ありませんが\n こちらも いろいろと ありました:
I see... I don't doubt your words, but we have
had our share of problems to deal with. I'll
need to confirm a few things myself.

132225.「……ふむ。邪悪なる意志によって\n なんらかの術が かけられていた痕跡が\n:
...Mhm. There seem to be traces of some
kind of spell placed by the Evil Will.

132226.「術……ですか。では <pc>さんと\n 戦ったとき 私が おかしくなったのは\:
Spell...? Then that must've been the reason I
went berserk when I fought with
<pc>...

132227.「今はもう その術は解けているようです。\n どうやら 私たちと 話をしたいとい:
It seems that the spell has worn off. I
suppose you weren't lying when you said you
wanted to talk with us.

132228.「……いいでしょう。\n それでは お互いの持てる情報を出しあい\n 今後の対策:
...Good. Let us share any information we have
with each other, and see if there's anything
we can come up with.

132229.<pc> クロウズ エステラの３人は\nお互いに これまでの出来事を伝え\nそし:
<pc>, Claws, and Estella all told
each other everything they knew, and continued
their discussion...

132230.「……なるほど。\n 大神殿の入り口は 守護の結界で\n 閉ざされてしまったと:
...I see. The entrance to the Grand Temple is
closed by a protective ward, you said?

132231.「それでは 大神殿へ\n 攻め込むことも かなわない……。\n ここでも 先手を:
If that's the case, we won't be able to
infiltrate the Grand Temple... It seems they
were one step ahead of us.

132232.「<kyodai>さんと 神の器の方々を救出すべく\n 侵入作戦を 立てていたと:
I was planning a strategy to infiltrate and
rescue <kyodai> and the divine
vessels, but now I think I have to reconsider.

132234.「<pc>さんの <kyodai_rel3>にあたる方です。\n 闇の領界で会っ:
It's <pc>'s sibling. You met them
while you were in the Dark Realm. They told
me that you were a pretty skilled priestess.

132235.「あっ……。それでは 闇の領界で\n 浄月の間に現れた あの人が……。:
Oh... so that's who that person was that
appeared in the Moonlit Hall...

132236.「<pc>さんにも\n ご兄弟が いらしたのですね……。:
So, <pc>, you also have a
sibling...

132237.「創生の霊核を奪うため 教団に潜入した際\n 私のチカラが及ばず 囚われてしまっ:
When we infiltrated the Order to steal the
core of creation, my power wasn't enough, and
they ended up getting captured.

132239.「ナドラガ神の復活の カギとなるものです。\n 大神殿の地下 その奥深くに\n:
It's the key to Nadraga's resurrection.
It was hidden deep beneath the Grand
Temple.

132240.「……私は 教団にいながら\n 本当に 何も 知らなかったのですね。:
...I was in the Order, and even I didn't know
all that much about it.

132241.「……今は 過去を悔やむよりも\n 未来へ 道をつなぐことを 考えましょう。\n:
Rather than dwelling on the past, we should
now be looking to the future. That's why
you came here.

132242.「……これから 私は 大神殿に入る方法を\n 聖都エジャルナで 探ってみようと思:
I will now try to find a way to get inside
of the Grand Temple.

132243.「邪悪なる意志が 発した言葉のとおりなら\n 事態は 一刻を争います……。:
If we're to believe the Evil Will's words,
then time is of the essence here...

132244.「……わかりました。\n 大神殿の件は あなたに おまかせしましょう。\n こち:
Understood. I'll leave the matter of the Grand
Temple to you. I'll see to it that
preparations are made.

132245.「ご協力に 感謝します クロウズさん。\n 進展がありましたら すぐに ご連絡し:
Thank you for your help. I'll contact you as
soon as I have something to report.

132246.「<pc>さん。\n ここまで 連れてきてくださり\n ありがとうございました。:
<pc>, I appreciate it very much
that you brought me here.

132247.「……邪悪なる意志には ことごとく\n 上を行かれ なんとも くやしい限りです。:
It really is a shame that this Evil Will
has managed to outmaneuver us at each and
every step we've taken...

132248.「ですが 彼女を味方にできたことは\n 幸運と言えるでしょう。\n <pc>さん:
But we're lucky to have her on our side now.
And it's all thanks to you, <pc>.

132249.「……<pc>さん。\n 結局 あなたのチカラに 頼りきりで\n 申し訳なく 思:
I ended up relying too much on your help, and
for that I deeply apologize.

132250.「ここまでの恩に 報いるためにも\n 心ばかりの品を 用意させてもらいました。\:
I've prepared a small gift for you, to repay
this kindness. Please accept it.

132251.「すべての領界が つながってしまった今\n この世界に 何が起こるか わかりませ:
Now that all the realms have been connected,
we don't know what will happen to this
world.

132252.「<pc>さんは ひとまず 身体を休め\n やがて 来るであろう 大きな戦いに向:
<pc>. You must rest and prepare
yourself for this great battle that will
inevitably come.

132762.「……私は 急ぎ 大神殿へと戻り\n 邪悪なる意志が 神官長その人であったことを:
I must hurry back to the Grand Temple and
report this news of the Evil Will being the
Archpriest himself...

144336.「知らない世界に 突然 連れてこられて\n 不安になることも あったけど……:
After being forced into an unknown world,
there were times I felt uneasy, but...

144337.「あなたに もう一度\n 会えるって 信じていたわ……。: I always believed I'd see you again...

144339.「ムストの方たちは この避難生活で\n かなり 疲れていらっしゃいますから……。:
Must's people are all so exhausted from having
to evacuate...

144340.「みなさん ボクと話していると\n 少し 気がまぎれるようなんです。\n この見:
Everyone seems to feel a little more at ease
when talking with me. Could it be my
appearance?

144341.「それは ちがうわ ラグアス王子。\n みんなに あなたの優しさが\n 伝わって:
That's not true, Raguas. I think it's because
everyone can see your kindness.

144342.「ありがとうございます アンルシア姫。\n それよりも <pc>さんに\n いろ:
Thank you, Anlucia. But more importantly,
there's some things that I need to talk to
<pc> about.

144344.「ここの竜族の方たちは\n ぼくたちを 賓客として 迎えてくれ\n とても 親切:
The Nadravians here have welcomed us as their
honored guests and have been so kind.

144345.「そうだわ。私たちが\n あれから どうしていたのかを\n <pc>に 話してお:
Yes, that's right. I'll tell you how we've all
been doing since then.

144346.「ついに エステラまでもが\n 私のもとから 去っていった……。: Finally, even Estella has left me...

144347.「たゆたう炎よ……。\n 解放者がもたらす 希望の行く末を\n 今ここに 示して:
O flickering flame... Show us now the hopeful
future the liberator shall bring us.

144348.「……すべての領界が つながった今\n 運命の時が すぐそこまで 近づいている。:
...Now that all the realms have been
connected, the time of destiny is nearly at
hand.

144349.「ナドラガ神よ……。\n どうか 最後のお導きを。\n 竜族の未来を 希望の光が:
O great Nadraga... I ask for your final
guidance. May the light of hope shine on the
future of the Nadravians...

147795.「そもそも 私が 奈落の門を開いたのは\n ナドラガンドの竜族を アストルティア:
My original intention of opening the Abyss
Gate was to invite those from Nadragand to
live in the Nadravian's Rest in Astoltia.

147796.「しかし 人間である シンイとしての\n 私のチカラが ある未来を予知していたの:
But my power as a human, as Shini... foretold
a certain future.

147797.「邪神となったナドラガ神が 教団の手で復活し\n アストルティアに 滅びをもたら:
That Nadraga, now a god of evil, would be
resurrected by the Order and bring destruction
to Astoltia...

147798.「ナドラガ神が復活すれば 我々の世界は\n 無に帰すことになる。これだけは\n:
If Nadraga is to return, our world will cease
to exist as we know it. We must stop that at
all costs.

147799.「<pc>さん。\n これが なんなのか わかりますか？: <pc>. Do you know what this is?

147800.「これこそが 創生の霊核……。\n かつて 大魔王マデサゴーラが求めた\n 強大:
This is the core of creation...this mighty
jewel was once sought after by the Great Demon
King Madesagora for its power.

147802.「創生の霊核は 邪神復活の要となるもの。\n これまで ナドラガ教団 大神殿の奥:
This core is the key to the evil god's
resurrection. Until now, it had been kept in
the Nadraga Order's Grand Temple.

147803.「そう……。<kyodai>さんと 私は\n 先日 大神殿に 潜入を試みたのです:
That's right... <kyodai> and I
attempted to infiltrate the Grand Temple just
the other day.

147804.「首尾よく 霊核の奪取に成功した 我々でしたが\n 教団の追っ手を振り切れず <:
We managed to take the core, but we couldn't
escape the Order. <kyodai> had
themselves captured to let me escape...

147805.「<kyodai>さんに 託された\n この霊核を持ち帰るだけで 精一杯でした…:
They entrusted me with the core, and that
is all I could do to make sure that it was
brought back here...

147806.「<kyodai>さんを 救いだす算段は\n 今 ととのえています。\n その時:
We're formulating a plan to rescue them. And
when the time comes, we'd like you to be a
part of it...

147807.「……そうか。嵐の領界への道を見張ってた\n 教団のヤツが いなくなったのは\n:
I see... So that's probably why that Order guy
who was guarding the way to the Storm Realm
suddenly up and left.

147809.「これは 私たちだけの問題じゃないわ。\n 邪神が復活すれば ここにいる人たちや:
This isn't just about us. If that evil god
returns, those here and even those in Astoltia
will...

147810.「だから 私は 戦うわ。\n お父様や お母様には 心配をかけてしまうけど\n:
That's why I have to fight. I know it's going
to worry my parents a lot, but... I want
nothing more than to protect everyone!

147811.「ぼくも ここに残って\n できる限りのことを するつもりです！:
I'll stay here and do everything I can to
help!

147812.「もちろん 国のことは 気になりますが\n <kyodai>さんから 今 メギス:
I am concerned about Megistris, of course...
But I heard from <kyodai> that
Uncle Nablette is taking care of things there.

147813.「おじさんが いてくれるなら\n ぼくが しばらく 国をはなれていても\n きっ:
If he's there, I'm sure things will be just
fine even if I have to be away for a while
longer.

147815.「父と母が 自らの命をついやしてまで\n 守ってくれた ぼくのこの身体を\n た:
Both my mother and father sacrificed their
lives to protect me... I must use that life
for the sake of helping others!

147816.「ここは ふたたび 結界を張って\n 封印しなければ なりません。\n 話の続き:
I'll have to have this place sealed with the
ward again. Let's continue our discussion in
the meeting room.

147818.「偵察に出ていた者より 報告がありました。\n ナドラガ教団の兵士らしき者 数名:
We received a report from some of our scouts.
They say that several of the Order's soldiers
have invaded the Storm Realm.

147819.「奴らは 異種族の少女ひとりを連れて\n 竜の背に乗り ナドラガ神のほこらへと\:
They are headed to the Nadraga Shrine on the
back of a dragon, with a girl of a different
race. What should we do?

147820.「ふむ……。おそらく その少女は\n エルフの神 エルドナの神の器である\n フ:
Hmm... perhaps that girl is Fuura. She is the
divine vessel of the Elf goddess, Eldona.

147821.「教団は 神の器がそろうのを待たずに\n ナドラガ復活の儀式を 始めるつもりなの:
Is the Order going to begin the resurrection
ritual without first assembling the vessels?
They are moving faster than I expected...

147822.「早急に 手を打つ必要が ありそうですね。: I think we need to take action immediately.

147823.「しかし クロウズ様。\n ほこらに向かうには 暴風の吹き荒れる\n 烈風の岬を:
But... in order to get to the shrine, you must
cross the Cape Squall, which is surrounded by
a raging storm.

147824.「教団の連中は 竜に乗って\n 岬を越えたと 報告にはありましたが……。:
The Order apparently rode a dragon across the
cape, but...

147825.「私が 竜化すれば よいのでしょうが\n ここの結界を このままにしておくわけに:
Although I could just turn into a dragon, it
would be unwise to leave the ward unguarded...
Is there another way, I wonder...?

147826.「<pc>さん。\n そちらの状況は 聞かせてもらいました。\n 私から 助言が:
<pc>. I overheard your
predicament. If I may, I'd like to offer you
some advice.

147828.「……えっ！？ その声は\n もしかして シオンさまなのですか？: Huh?! That voice... could it be? Shion?

147829.「ええ。この人形を通して グランゼドーラ城から\n 声だけを お届けしています。:
Correct. Through this doll, I am transmitting
my voice from the castle. I am relieved to
know that you are safe.

147830.「ご心配をおかけして すみませんでした。\n <pc>も 来てくれましたし\n:
I'm sorry to have made you worry.
<pc> has also come to help, and
I am doing fine.

147831.「ところで アンルシア。\n 私の託したペンダントは お持ちですか？\n できれ:
That reminds me. Anlucia, do you have that
pendant I gave you before? If so, I'd really
like to have it back.

147833.「たしかに 返してもらいました。\n これで 私はチカラを取り戻せます。:
Indeed, this is it. Now my power can return
to me once again.

147834.「それでは 話を戻して……\n 烈風の岬を越える方法を\n お伝えすることに い:
Now, back on topic... I will tell you how to
cross over the Cape Squall.

147835.「そこで……。風の町アズランでは\n よき風を呼ぶために 風送りの儀というものが:
So... did you know that in Azlan, there is a
ceremony held called the Wind Send-Off
Ceremony that brings forth good winds?

147836.「風送りの儀では 風のたづなという祭具が\n 使われますが それは エルドナの神:
The ceremony uses a ritual object called the
Wind Reins, which are modeled after Eldona's
Divine Wind Reins.

147837.「天風のたづなは かつて エルフの神エルドナが\n 使ったもの。もし それが 手:
The Divine Wind Reins were once used by
Eldona. If you could somehow obtain them, you
would be able to go and see Amazlantelope.

147838.「エルトナ大陸の イナミノ街道のどこかに\n 風のたづなを作れる職人がいると 聞:
I heard that somewhere on the Inamino Highway
in Eltona, there is a craftsman who can make
Wind Reins. Why not try going there?

147839.「私から伝えられるのは このくらいです。\n それでは……。:
And that's about all I can tell you. And with
that...

147840.「……なるほど。神獣アマカムシカのチカラを\n 本当に 借りることができるのなら:
I see... if we can borrow Amazlantelope's
power, we may have a chance of being able to
cross through the Cape Squall's storm.

147841.「<pc>さん。申し訳ありませんが\n ここは あなたに 頼んでもよいでしょうか:
<pc>. I'm sorry, but may I ask you to
take the lead here?

147842.「オレも <pc>と 一緒に行くぜ。\n ここにいても やることは なさそうだし:
I'm going with <pc>. I don't think
there's much I can do here.

147843.「ん……。おい <pc>。\n 今 どっかで 鈴か何かの音が\n しなかったか？:
Huh...? Hey, <pc>. Did you hear
something that sounded like a bell just now?<yesno><close>

147844.「……やっぱ オレの気のせいのようだ。: I guess I'm just hearing things...

147845.「私が <pc>と 一緒に行くわ。\n フウラさんを 助けましょう！:
I'll go with you. Let's do what we can do help
Fuura!

147846.「エルトナ大陸の イナミノ街道には\n 山間の関所という 人の集まる場所がありま:
On the Inamino Highway, there is a place where
people are gathered called the Mountain Pass.
You should probably try there first.

147847.「それでは <pc>さん。\n 天風のたづなの入手を 頼みましたよ。:
Please do what you can to get those Divine
Wind Reins.

147849.「神の器は オレが もらっていくぜ。\n ラグアス王子も フウラもな。:
I'm taking the divine vessels. Raguas and
Fuura are coming with me.

147850.「果てなき領界の苦難に 重積した民の不安は\n さらなる災いの火種によって\n:
The people's anxiety, burdened by the endless
hardships in each realm... will be ignited
like flame in a dry, barren field.

147851.「教団は 彼らに対し 愚直にも\n 救いの手を 差しのべずには いられまい。\n:
The Order cannot just stand by and do nothing
to help them. They lead a banner of hope,
that banner being a liberator.

147852.「さすれば 民は 解放者を渇望する。\n そこに <cs_pchero>……。\:
That's when the people long for a liberator.
And there you were, <cs_pchero>...
Appearing here without knowing a thing.

147853.「我は この姿をもって 災いの象徴となった。\n いつの世も 目に見えるもののみ:
In this form, I have become a symbol of
calamity. However, throughout history, only
what is seen has spurred on great change...

155899.「同族の言葉すらも 信じられぬ今\n 異種族の者の言葉など\n 信じられるはずが:
How do you expect me to believe the words of
an outsider when I can't even believe the
words of my own people?!

155900.「これは たいへん 失礼しましたっ！！: I am terribly sorry for the mix up!!

155901.「あなたが来たと聞いて\n すぐに 来ようと思ったのですが\n 町の方と ちょっ:
I was going to come as soon as I heard you
were here, but I was chatting a bit with the
townsfolk.

155903.「嵐の領界には 神獣アマカムシカがいます。\n エルドナ神の眷族にして カムシカ:
In this realm exists the divine beast Amazlantelope. He is a servant of Eldona, and king of all Azlantelopes. He can run thousands
of miles in a single day.

155904.「そのチカラを 借りることができれば\n 烈風の岬に 吹き荒れる暴風も\n やす:
If you could borrow his power, then you'd have
no troubles crossing through that raging
storm...

155905.「<pc> 悪いが 気が変わった。\n 一緒に行くのは やめにするぜ。:
Actually... I changed my mind. I'm not gonna
go with you.

155906.「マティルの村の悲劇を 二度と起こさない……。\n そのためには ナドラガさまを:
I will never let the tragedy that befell Matil
Village ever happen again... We must
revive Nadraga and seek his salvation.

155907.「<cs_pchero>さん……。\n あなたも 見てきたはずでしょう？\n そ:
You have seen it all, have you not...?
All of dragonkind is suffering in every realm!

155908.「私は…… 私は…………。\n 今も 苦しみつづける竜族の民を\n 救わなければ:
I... I must... I must save all those who are
still suffering!! It is my duty!

155909.「そのためならば……！！: If it is for that reason, I must...!

155910.「すみません <pc>さん。\n アンルシア姫たちを どうか お守りください。\:
Sorry, <pc>, but I must ask you
to protect Anlucia and the others. I will join
you as soon as I'm finished with the ward!

155911.「教団は 神の器を使い\n ５つの領界に封じられた\n ナドラガ神の肉体を よみ:
The Order will use the divine vessels to
resurrect Nadraga's body, which had been
sealed across the five realms...

155912.「神墟ナドラグラムで ナドラガ神の復活を\n 果たすつもりなのでしょう。:
They aim to resurrect him in the Nadragram
Shrine.

155913.「神墟ナドラグラムの出現が\n どのような 影響を与えるのかは\n 私にも まっ:
I have no idea what kind of impact the
appearance of the Nadragram Shrine will have.

159618.「この入り口を 見つけられてしまった以上\n 生かして 帰すわけには いかぬ！！:
But now that you've found the entrance, we
cannot let you leave here alive!!

159619.「まずは…… 私が どのようにして\n この地で このような立場に就いているのか:
First... let me tell you how I came to be in
this position.

159620.「ですが おそらく アマカムシカは\n 霧に守られた神獣の森の 奥深くに\n 姿:
But, perhaps Amazlantelope has disappeared
deep into the Stormbough, protected by a
thick fog.

159621.「アンルシア姫 お待ちなさい。\n あなたは まだ 戦える状態ではないはずです。:
Wait, Anlucia. You are in no condition to be
fighting yet.

159622.「先日 悪しき業風から\n 皆を守ってくれたときに あなたは\n かなり 無理を:
You strained yourself pretty hard the other
day protecting everyone from those evil winds,
didn't you?

159623.「ちゃんと 回復するまでは 部屋で\n 安静にしているよう お願いします。\n:
I think it'd be best to stay in your room and
rest until you are recovered. It's not just
your body that's at stake here.

159624.「ごめんなさい クロウズさん。\n どうしても <pc>の\n チカラになりたく:
I'm sorry... I just really wanted to help
<pc>.

159625.「……いえ よいのです。\n 私も そのお気持ちは よくわかりますよ。:
Don't worry, it's fine. I completely
understand your feelings.

159626.「ですが 外へ出ることだけは おやめください。\n ご自身の身を守ることも お忘:
But I ask that you please do not go outside.
You mustn't forget to protect yourself as
well.

159628.「<pc>。私は ここに残って\n 身体を治すことに 専念するわ。\n 気をつけ:
Well, I'm going to stay here and focus on
recovering. Please be careful...

160731.「ましてや エルドナ神の加護を受けし\n 風乗りの少女が 危険にさらされるとなれ:
And if that Wind Rider girl who had been
blessed by Eldona is in danger, I cannot just
wait idly by.

160732.「クロウズさんから 聞いてしまったわ。\n あなたが この世界のどこかで\n 命:
Claws told me everything. He said that you
may die somewhere in this world...

160733.「どうやら 結界の強化のために\n 必要なものが そろっているようですね。\n:
It looks as if you have everything needed to
reinforce the ward. May I please have them?

160734.クロウズに 魔法生物のニコちゃんと\nエレクトラムを 渡しますか？<yesno>:
Give Claws the magical creature Smyles and
the Electrum?<yesno><close>

160735.「今は 一刻を争うときなのです。\n 結界の強化に 必要なものを\n 渡してくだ:
We have to act now. Can you please give me
what is needed for the ward?

160736.<pc>は クロウズに\nニコちゃんと エレクトラムを 渡した。:
<pc> gave Claws Smyles and the
Electrum.

160737.「おお……。これが <kyodai>さんが\n この時のために 残してくれたもの:
Oh... so this is what <kyodai>
left us for this very moment, is it?

160738.「<pc>……。\n 短い間だったけど ありがとう。\n これで あなたとは お:
Thank you for the leaf... brief time we had
together, <pc>... This is my
farewell to you.

160739.「でも 悲しんだりしないでちょうだい。\n 私は このために 生まれたの。\n:
But don't be sad! This is what I sprouted to
life for. I feel so proud!

160740.「それじゃあ さようなら。\n あなたの ふところの中\n とても 暖かかったわ:
Well, goodbye, then. Your embrace was really
warm...

160741.「いったん この会議室は 閉じますので\n <pc>さんは 集会所へ お願いしま:
I will close off this room for now. Please
make your way to the assembly hall to
help protect the divine vessels.

160742.「……そうだ。貴様には 何もできぬのだ！\n 我が神の意思により さえぎられし\:
That's right... you are powerless! Your
foresight is useless by our god's will,
nothing more than a product of your delusion.

160743.「……時が満ちる。\n 神の器を贄とし 我が神が肉体を得て\n 現世へと再臨する:
The time shall come...when our god shall take
flesh once more using the divine vessels
as his sacrifice.

160744.「貴様たちに できることなど 何もない。\n ここで 大人しく 我が神の救済を\:
It's useless to continue this pointless
struggle. Stay right there, and obediently
accept Nadraga's will...

160745.「私の予知の能力は\n なんらかのチカラによって\n 弱められていると 考えてい:
I assume that some kind of power has weakened
my ability to see into the future.

160746.「教団に潜入した際 見つけた文献に\n 書かれていた 一文です。:
It's a passage I read from a document when I
infiltrated the Order.

160747.「<pc>さん。\n 翠嵐の聖塔へ 行ってもらえますか？:
<pc>. Could you head to the Storm
Tower for me?

160748.<center>悔やめるエルドナが 打ち込みし\n嵐のくさびを 取り払わんとする:
Ye who seek to remove the wedge of storm,
struck by the regretful Eldona...

160749.<center>神聖なる試練の戦いに 悪しき魔獣を\n用いしこと 断じて 許しが:
To use this wicked beast during this sacred
trial is unforgivable. I will not recognize
thy victory over me.

160750.<center>異を唱えるならば 今一度 チカラを示せ。\nさすれば 炎の領界へ:
If thou would doubt me, then show me thy
strength once more. Only then will the path
to the Fire Realm truly open.

160752.「このまま エステラが戦えば\n 命を落とすことに なるだろう……。:
If Estella keeps fighting like this, she is
going to die...

160754.「だから 恥を忍んで 頼みたい……。\n どうか 代わりに 守護者たちと\n 戦:
I'm ashamed to ask this of you, but...
Will you please fight the guardian in our
stead?<yesno><close>

160755.「頼めた義理でないのは 承知の上だ。\n それでも どうか……頼む。\n 守護者:
I know it's not my place to ask. But please...
I'm begging you. Will you fight the guardian
in our stead...?<yesno><close>

160758.「ナドラガンドに 真の救済を。\n それこそが 我らの神の望むものなり。:
This is Nadragand's true salvation. It is
our god's will.

160760.「だが 嘆くことはない。\n 貴様たちは 我の思惑どおり\n 存分に 踊ってくれ:
But there's no reason to grieve. You've all
done splendidly, just as I intended.

160761.「いわれなき業を背負いつづけた 我ら竜族は\n ナドラガ神の ご加護によって\n:
By Nadraga's blessing, we, the Nadravians
borne with a burden of unjust karma, will
know true salvation!

160762.「オルストフさまに 伝えなければ……。: I must tell Master Orstov about this...

160763.<cs_pchero>の ふところの中から\n白き導き手が 声をかけてきた。:
The Handy Horse called out
from <cs_pchero>'s pocket.

160764.「<cs_pchero>……。\n あなたも 聖都エジャルナの大神殿に\n 行く:
<cs_pchero>... I think it would be a good
idea to go to the Grand Temple in Ejarna.

160765.「おそらく アンルシアたちは\n 大神殿のいずこかに 囚われているか……\n 少:
Perhaps that's where Anlucia and the others
are being held. There should at least be
some sort of clue there.

160766.「どうか 急いでください。\n すべての領界がつながった今 彼女たちの身に\n:
Please, you must hurry. With all of the realms
connected, there is no telling what might
happen to them!

160767.「……神の器が 大神殿に捕らわれていると？\n たしかに これまでのことを思えば:
...You're saying that the divine vessels are
being held in the Grand Temple? Based on what
we've seen, you're probably right...

160768.「神の器によって 儀式が 行われれば\n ナドラガ神の身体も 復活を果たす。\n:
Once the ritual with the divine vessels is
performed, Nadraga's body will be resurrected.
Furthermore...

160769.「何度も 予知のチカラを使ってみましたが\n 暗き道を進んだ先に 見えるのは\n:
I've used my power of foresight many times,
but using it to go down this dark path...all
I see is a pitch-black world of nothingness...

160770.「それでも 今は できることをしなければ。\n まずは 騎士団の者を 各領界に送:
Even still, we must do we can for now. I'll
send the Knights to each of the realms to keep
track of the Order's movements.

160771.「私は さらに 文献をあさり\n 神墟ナドラグラムや 創生の霊核について\n く:
I'm going to do some further reading to
find more information on the Nadragram Shrine,
and the core of creation.
